    Description
    class 
    EBook
    Represents an electronic book in the library system.
    class 
    PhysicalBorrowableBook
    The PhysicalBorrowableBook class represents a physical book in the library system that can be borrowed and reserved by users.
    class 
    PhysicalNonBorrowableBook
    Represents a physical book that cannot be borrowed.
